system.description: Investigate the erratic behaviour of the lesser noble Lans Guljian. Visit Hesentanz Manor in the Apex, examine the circumstances of his madness, and determine the source of the xenos artefact—the black orb—that has driven him insane. Recover the orb and follow any leads to its supplier.

Trace the xenos artefact trade from the Babyfaces gang at the Screaming Wheel cantina to their supplier, the Sable Trader Zax Holthane, operating out of Three Stakes' Rest. Capture or interrogate Holthane to discover the source of the smuggled goods and the details of incoming shipments.

Proceed to Port Gyre and investigate the corruption within the port authority. Identify the official responsible for doctoring shuttle landing records—Prefect Gaius Anteshern—and determine the time and location of the next incoming smuggler's shuttle.

Intercept Arvus Lighter 341 Beta-Sky at Landing Platform Tertius-9. Whether by shooting it down, boarding it on arrival, or observing covertly, prevent the delivery of proscribed cargo to the arch-heretek Somnius Halbrel. Recover or destroy all xenos artefacts aboard.

The Daemonhost Suvfaeras has escaped into the deep tunnels beneath Port Gyre. Track it through the Underport before it regains full strength, while contending with the arch-heretek Halbrel's forces who pursue it for their own vile purposes. Destroy or banish the Daemonhost at all costs.

A perfectly smooth black orb, heavy and cold to the touch, about the size of a clenched fist. It never rolls—when placed on a slanted surface, it slides, but its orientation never changes. Of clearly xenos origin and potentially millions of years old.

After carrying the orb for a few hours, the bearer experiences visions of a vast and barren alien landscape, studded with massive and bizarre structures. This requires a Fear (1) test. Visions repeat at irregular intervals and continue as long as the bearer is in proximity to the orb. A psyker can sense the stink of the Warp on a Routine (+20) Psyniscience test.

The orb is extremely dangerous and should be recovered for the Inquisitor.

A small box of black metal containing what appears to be the mummified hand of an alien creature, with three clawed fingers. Found hidden beneath a floor grate in Holthane's manufactorum.

The hand is of no obvious function but is clearly of xenos origin, linking Holthane to the Trade Sable. If brought within half a metre of the black orb from Guljian's study, the hand twitches slightly.

The hand should be recovered and turned over to the Inquisitor for examination.
